description: Fired when an action initiated by an entity is successfully executed by the game logic.

payloadSchema.title: Core: Action Executed Event Payload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload structure for the 'core:action_executed' event.

actorId.description: The ID of the entity that successfully executed the action.

actionId.description: The ID of the action that was executed (e.g., 'core:move', 'combat:attack').

result.description: The result object returned by the action's execution logic. Conforms to the ActionResult definition, containing success status and potentially messages useful for UI feedback or logging.
